entry.source: To all Demon Hunters: We would like your help{F801}in collecting food supplies. We require a{F801}{F804,5}{F872,1}.{F804,0} Rukhs have a habit of{F801}laying their eggs in high places, so you can{F801}likely find one in that {F804,5}tower that reaches to{F801}the ceiling.{F804,0} An egg that big will feed an army!{F801}
